content: this square works up to 12 if done in worsted weight yarn and 9 1/2 if done in dk its size can be easily modified by adding row to the outside the instructions look long but there is considerable explanation of the cluster stitches that make up the flower the pattern can be made in one colour or colours can be changed the pattern has been edited for changes - version 4 now available change is to treble_crochet round it will still work with the original version please note you are welcome to translate this pattern but please include credit to the original pattern via here or my website and please translate the pattern as written with out making your own changes to it if you are crocheting your own kata you are welcome to make as many changes as you d like
